headline: Tech Weekly podcast: Marissa Mayer joins Yahoo
text: This week Aleks Krotoski and Guardian Technology editor Charles Arthur discuss the upside to Yahoo's appointment of former Google executive Marissa Mayer. Also, why Google bought out the email client Sparrow and if the Samsung v Apple patent wars will ever end.  Aleks talks exclusively to the new deputy chief executive of the Tech City Advisory Board, Benjamin Southworth, and one of the board advisers, tech investor Eileen Burbidge, about the future of East London's tech industries and why the government and investment sector should focus efforts on this growth area.
